Detailed Description

Container class for all certificates on the card.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

BEIDSDK_API eIDMW::BEID_Certificates::BEID_Certificates (  ) 

Create an BEID_Certificates store without any link to a card.

This store is not link to any Card, so some methods could not be used. These methods throw BEID_ExBadUsage exception.

virtual BEIDSDK_API eIDMW::BEID_Certificates::~BEID_Certificates (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

BEIDSDK_API unsigned long eIDMW::BEID_Certificates::countFromCard (  ) 

The number of certificates on the card.

BEIDSDK_API unsigned long eIDMW::BEID_Certificates::countAll (  ) 

The number of certificates (on the card or not).

BEIDSDK_API BEID_Certificate& eIDMW::BEID_Certificates::getCertFromCard ( unsigned long  ulIndexCard  ) 

Get the ulIndex certificate from the card.

Throw BEID_ExParamRange exception if the index is out of range.

BEIDSDK_API BEID_Certificate& eIDMW::BEID_Certificates::getCert ( unsigned long  ulIndexAll  ) 

Return the certificate with the number ulIndexAll.

ATTENTION ulIndexAll and ulIndexCard are two different index. Index will change if new certificates are added with addCert().

BEIDSDK_API BEID_Certificate& eIDMW::BEID_Certificates::getCert ( BEID_CertifType  type  ) 

Return the certificate by type.
